availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Allen County, Kentucky, attorney. Allen County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Fletcher Gatewood and Mary Calvert Gatewood. Married to Frances K. Burton Gatewood in Allen County, Kentucky on November 13, 1855. Father of Mary A. O. Gatewood and Minnie Gatewood. Attorney in Allen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 362.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Allen County, Scottsville, p. 176A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994027, Allen County Marriages p. 1.
Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1959, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Davidson County Death Certificates, File #30052.
"John Jasper Gatewood (1830-1907)," Find A Grave, Memorial #35709443, accessed June 25, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/35709443.
